item.title: Open Graph image
item.description: Within any page, you can add in the FrontMatter a images array that will be used to define a specific Open Graph image. For example, see content/_index.md page:

item.title: Clarence Stein Institute Interactive Database Viewer
item.description: This interactive database viewer was built as part of a year long project of restarting the Clarence Stein Institute of Urban and Landscape Studies at the Department of City and Regional Planning, Cornell University. The work was part of my year long appointment at the Institute from August 2017 to August 2018. The interactive database documents the projects funded by the Institute from its establishment in 1992 to 2015. The institute has funded projects across the entire world!

item.title: Aadhaar Pulse
item.description: Aadhaar Pulse is an ongoing project about leveraging the digital identity for bureaucratic decision making in a world of unified digital identities.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am a researcher interested in developing data driven insights to inform public policy. I currently work as a Research Associate at the Department of Economics and Public Policy, Indian School of Business Hyderabad with Ashwini Chhatre and Avik Sarkar. I also hold a secondary appointment as a Research Assistant at the Department of Real Estate, Wharton School of Business, University of Pennsylvania. My current research spans across three areas of public policy;
